objective.section_data: Seeking a position in which I can apply my experience in politics, programming, and client service in an environment where I will have the opportunity to further develop my technical skills.

section_data.title: Account Manager at Aristotle, Inc (February 2017 – Present)

skills.data: Serve as primary point of contact for over 30 PAC & Grassroots clients
Train clients on using Aristotle’s database software (Aristotle 360) and website editing
Manage projects and write technical specifications for custom website and database tools
Foster and maintain positive relationships with clients

section_data.title: Research Director at Project Vote Smart (April 2016 – January 2017)

skills.data: Trained and managed a team of 12 staff and up to 40 interns
Monitored database quality control using SQL
Served as primary point of contact for several partnering organizations
Provided support for bulk data collection using SQL and API calls

section_data.title: Research Associate at Project Vote Smart (January 2015 – March 2016)

skills.data: Researched caller questions for a voter research hotline

achievements.title: Languages/Courses:
achievements.data: Javascript, HTML, CSS, JSON, Node JS, Mongo DB, React, etc.

achievements.title: Degree:
achievements.data: Bachelor of Arts in Political Science with minors in Religious Studies, Philosophy, Psychology, and Anthropology

achievements.title: Grade Point Average:
achievements.data: Overall: Magna Cum Laude; Within Major: 3.78

achievements.title: Honors and Extracurricular Activities:
achievements.data: Magna Cum Laude Pi Sigma Alpha National Political Science Honors Society; Dean’s list five out of seven eligible semesters

achievements.title: Summer Study Program:
achievements.data: The Washington Center for Internships and Academic Seminars
